document.full_text: the sentencing of habib el-adli, the once-feared former interior minister, ended the first in a series of corruption trials of top figures in the government of hosni mubarak.
document.title: once feared egypt official gets 12 years and fine
lines_and_colors: the sentencing of habib el-adli, the once-feared former interior minister, ended the first in a series of corruption trials of top figures in the government of hosni mubarak.
